text: (nampikkaiyillata) avarkal oru manakketana kariyattaic ceytu vittal, "enkal mutataiyarkalai itan mite kantom; innum allah enkalai ataikkonte evinan" enru colkirarkal. "(Appatiyalla!) Niccayamaka allah manakketana ceyalkalaic ceyyak kattalaiyitamattan - ninkal ariyatatai allahvin mitu poyyakak kurukirirkala?" Enru (napiye!) Nir ketpiraka
